exp.description: Hands-on experience at Roya.com Media Design Inc. Proficient in translating intricate wireframes (Photoshop) into dynamic websites utilizing a robust skill set encompassing HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Google AMP, and Canvas CMS. Collaborating closely with graphic designers, I ensure precise implementation of designs while fostering efficiency through stand-up meetings and iterative development. Applying SEO best practices, I drive increased traffic from search engines, enhancing online visibility.
